divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife Kelly went out on the back deck to have a cigarette. She noticed a starfall, stop,change to red lights then fly toward the house.I thought it was anaircraft except the lights were vertical. I noticed the diamond silhouette andthe windows and how slow it was flying and realized it wasmt an aircraft. Objectfell from sky at a tremendous speed, stopped then cruised at slow speed thenstopped and shot straight up in the air and disapeared.I will be happy to fax the offical report.
